articles.title: Australian Open 2022 | Not the Djokovic we know - Moneycontrol.com
articles.description: The tennis great’s expectation that he be allowed to play the Australian Open without taking the Covid vaccine smacks of the very traits he has eschewed – vanity and elitism.
